Package org.taverna.server.master.factories

These interfaces define the principal way for the factories of worker classes to be invoked.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurableRunFactory
    Interface to run factories for the purpose of configuration.
    ListenerFactory
    How to make event listeners of various types that are attached to a workflow instance.
    RunFactory
    How to construct a Taverna Server Workflow Run.

Package org.taverna.server.master.factories Description

These interfaces define the principal way for the factories of worker classes to be invoked.
